SummaryEnglish: Koihime Musou re-imagines the classic Chinese historical novel Romance of the Three Kingdoms in action/love comedy form with an all-female cast.

1.TitleEnglish: Rival Warlords Battle for the Position of Student Body President: There Will Also Be Flying Tops!
1.SummaryEnglish: Bring all characters to modern time. Where they became a students of St.Francesca Academy. They set group and and competing with each other. Who win will take the student council president place. Koumei, a new transfer student to St. Francesca Academy, is asked by Kan'u to join her team to help her win the contest that will decide the new president of the student council.

2.TitleEnglish: Rival Warlords Vacation on a Tropical Island: There Will Also Be Tentacles!
2.SummaryEnglish: The story takes place at St. Francesca Academy. After the battle between the students ended, they all go to a southern island.

3.SummaryEnglish: A spin-off project from the original series that Kan'u, Chouhi, Ryuubi and other characters sing the theme songs from Koihime Musou and Shin Koihime Musou on the stage.

4.TitleEnglish: It's a School Festival! Everyone Assemble!
4.SummaryEnglish: Everyone is preparing major productions for the school festival, from magic acts to maid cafés to big musical numbers.

7.TitleEnglish: Shin Koihime†Musou: Otome Tairan OVA Omake
